LanguageData.RT_M1A2_MainBattleTank_Blueprint.label: M1A2T Abrams
LanguageData.RT_M1A2_MainBattleTank_Blueprint.descrip:
A powerful MBT from a by-gone era, produced for foreign military trade. Equipped with a 120 mm smoothbore cannon and multiple machine gun armaments.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x2, Gunner x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
120mm Cannon shell（Main cannon）
.50 BMG（Turret and Coaxial MG）
7.62x51mm NATO（Support and Barrel MG）
